info.name: Updated SCP Wiki Night Mode (READ THE DESCRIPTION)
info.description: An updated modification of SCP Wiki Night Mode to add additional edits to pages that like to mess with the format. NOTE: Unfortunately there is an error with stylish that causes the regexp to be cut off in code 2 due to how lengthy it is, the only method I know of how to fix it is below. 1. Select the edit button above (assuming you installed it). 2. Scroll down to code 2 in the new window. 3. There should be an "applies to" section under the code, replace it with the notes from the latest update below: 4. Press save. If you did everything correctly it should be functioning.
info.additionalInfo:
Copy the regexp below if you're following the above tutorial:
(https?://)?(www.)?(scp-wiki|scpsandbox2|scpexplained|05command)(.net|.wikidot.com)(?!/(k-o-failure-scenario-hub|djkaktus-s-proposal-ii|third-law-hub|abstract-naught|a-confluence-of-clandestine-conferences|automatic-stop|avatara|comedown-machine-hub|conqueror-worm|deus-vulture|grant-request-for-genetically-engineering-low-cost-organic-a|grant-request-for-investigating-the-potential-application-of|grant-request-for-the-construction-of-an-interstellar-scienc|grant-request-for-utilization-of-electro-thaumic-computers-t|guns-pointed-hub|hypervelocity|moonlighting|operation-llewyn-dark|preliminary-report|samsara|slow-animals|terminal-velocity|the-analog-kid|the-bard-of-ambrose|the-dedekind-infinite-demographic|the-end-has-no-end|the-fountain-of-lamneth|t-minus|to-be-noir-not-to-be|t-plus|uiu-file-2014-014|under-control|unicorn-horn|zeitgeist|a-farewell-to-kings|moving-pictures|permanent-waves|unusual-investigations|uiu-file-1941-016|uiu-file-2016-004|three-portlands-hub|yellow-plumbers|osanshouo|third-law-hub|dr-wondertainment-hub|marshall-carter-and-dark-hub|thieves-come-in-fives|an-average-life|brian-brayer-brand-pocket-vacations|mcd-fidget-winners|mcd-hadrians-well|hypnotraline|imperfectly-fossilized-eggs-m4rho-edope-fo5le|iris-dark|kaiju-caviar-ocn39-t5fg6-7hjl2|lego-minithinkers-8y9d5-2x4h7-s89m2|mcd-little-draft-horses|mcd-bloodbaths|number-crunching|osteotronic-cubes-vxy33-f7rq3-9xad1|robert-carter|schulman-ny-programmable-mnestic-device-ac34d-nc77q-95dcs|rogue-ai-nveo4-yvn3e-pn6ug|skitter-marshall|some-rational-inheritance|the-dark-web-dke79-o2rg5-4jlw6|thieves-come-in-fives|third-death|wills-and-ways-hub|two-transcribed-conversations-in-very-different-tones)).*
